content.detailedDescription: I quincy whyte age 36 and my son zavien age 12 had an amazing ufo encounter.  it was today september 14th 2015 at approximately 3:44 pm.  we were on our way back from my sons school, on my bike riding up our street which is west 95th street in cleveland ohio.  i noticed in the ne sky there was an odd looking object in the sky.  my best description would be like a cigar shaped with both ends being white and the center black. it was moving slowly towards the se.  while watching it a jet plane went by on its path to land at our nearby airport.  we stopped in our neighbors front yard/ driveway.  when the object got to se sky in our viewing site, out of nowhere a disc shaped object flew in from the eastern direction  towards the white object and banked at bout almost 90 degrees and basically went back in the direction that the white object originally came from (ne) at the same time another jet was coming in to prepare to land, the disc made another almost 90 degree bank and within a blink of an eye was outta site. i feel that both objects had to big pretty big like 100 plus feet.  as soon as i ran in the house i made a quick drawing and tried to draw a pic of flight paths based on what i saw.  i then thought of mufon and wanted to let you guys know what we say today.  if you investigate this and find out any new information please let me know by calling or email me please.   also neither object made any noise.
content.summary: My son and i witnessed two objects one being the disc shaped and the other cigar shaped. this was at the same time, i will explain better in the detailed description.

content.detailedDescription: I came to my house with my daughter and we saw the moon because was so bright and we saw the green circle or sphere moving around the moon. i try to do video but didn't work my daughter took few pictures. look very green and bright and then gone!
content.summary: Green esphere or circle was moving around the moon.

content.detailedDescription: I often set out on the beach at night and for the past few years shortly after the sun goes down within an hour multiple star like lights will seem to appear out of nowhere more or less winking in. all the lights are composed of two points of light next to each other and the altitude is way too low for them to be stars. they hover there stationary for a few hours and normally since i do not want to spend the night on the beach i will leave before i know where they go to. i have seen the lights further inland but it is not as easy to see because of the traffic and city lights. i have seen some of them winking out and where they go i do not know. i have seen a few that after hovering for about an hour will slowly move off to the left or right. i do not believe that they are stars because they are all twin points of light close together. i was curious if this was a phenomenon that was only occurring in florida. i went up to dayton, ohio to visit relatives for a week and made it a point to observe the night sky there and saw the same lights only not as many. i saw a film clip of when the small fleet of flying objects flew over the white house shortly after world war two and they did a close up shot. the objects had 2 points of light just like what i have seen. my question is if there is a grid of craft hovering over us what is their purpose? some nights there are just a few other nights there are a few hundred. for any one who wants to check it out clear nights are best. on some overcast nights you cant see anything. would send photos but don't have the equipment. just had to tell some one who can appreciate my message. thanks
content.summary: Multiple 2 point starlike lights hovering in grid pattern over florida coastline

content.detailedDescription: One of our dogs refused to enter the bedroom so i brought him into the study and i was on the computer when from the corner of my eye, i saw bursts of light from the security camera monitor. i saw very large globes of bright lights appear by a weeping cherry and some bushes in front of our garage tthey moved very fast , they descended, moved around the tree  bushes very rapidly, then seemed to disappear. this lasted approximately 15=19 minutes. i have 8 dogs and prior to this event, every time i would take them outside, regardless of time, would run over to a gate that opened near the side of the garage and they would all stare at the trees but i could never see anything. the area is heavily wooded. i woke my husband up so he could see what was happening, but we have no explanation for what happened.I was very nervous and my heart started pounding while it was happening. i was upset and was very short of temper during the week end. i have to retrieve the video from the hard drive in order to submit film. i uploaded from iphone to facebook. i would need someone's cell phone to send clip to. when i try to send via regular message, i get the message videpo clip is too long.
content.summary: Security camera recorder movement and episode of large lights

content.detailedDescription: It was september 14th 2015@ approximatly 3:44 pm. i had picked up my son from school and we were riding my bike and we noticed an object in the sky in a cylinder type shape it had two white ends and the center was black. there were no wings and it was about 50 degrees above horizon traveling like a north to south direction.  we heard no noise until a jet went over towards the airport.  we continued watching this until bout it made it towards the southeast direction in our view. then this is when it got crazy. a silver disk came out of nowhere above it actually turning when it came into view. this ufo took a similar path the opposite way that the cylinder was heading. no noise at all. this object was moving at a fast pace when another jet was coming in for a landing when the ufo made a 90degree turn and disappeared over the jet with crazy speed gone in a blink. i felt an awesome experience because i believe and i was happy they showed me and my son the truth.
content.summary: My son and i witnessed a silver disk in daylight fly across sky.  also there was a second cylinder type object and also a jet preparing to land.

content.detailedDescription:
Came outside about 750 pm to go home when i noticed what i thought was a bright star then i realized it was under a very large cloud formation so i started watching it. my dad also witnessed this but he left. as i continued watching i thought i saw the color change from white to a blueish tent back to white and thought i saw it drift. i wasn't sure so i made up my mind to leave then the object did a figure 8 that's when i pulled my phone out and started filming. it moved left right up and down below the tree line. while it was doing this it changed color again from white to pinkish. honestly i think its a drone. but as far away as the trees are, its a big drone. 

ive tried to upload the video for 2 hours both from my computer and phone and i dont have time.
content.summary: Thought it was a star,realized it was under clouds, changed color did a figure 8, i started filming.

content.detailedDescription: On august 8th, 2015 around nine p.M. i went outside to smoke a cigarette and out of the corner of my eye i saw a bright blue light coming from the east.  i thought originally it was a star but it was too low in the sky. then two white lights sort of came out of the blue light.  by this point i could not take my eyes away, the three lights were moving very fast in strange ways and i deduced that it was no star or plane.  the odd movements made no sound the lights gave me an almost playful feeling and i even remember smiling.  this light show lasted about ten minutes when all three suddenly disappeared. i waited a few minutes to see if they would reappear and while i was waiting a helicopter came quietly from the east.  i am a military veteran and i have never seen a helicopter move that quietly.  the quietly moving helicopter went right to where the lights were until i could see it no longer.  my neighbor caught the very end of the lights and she said she witnessed something similar the previous evening. i later found out about mufon and decided to share.
content.summary: I went outside when i noticed a blue light from the east, two white lights came out of the blue and flew around

content.detailedDescription: While on a sight seeing drive in the mountains of colorado on 09/12/2015 with my wife and step-daughter we stopped at the twin lakes area to shoot some photos and did not notice anything strange until i got home and was looking at the photos.  when i first looked at the photo in question, i thought to myself, what is that object in the upper right corner of the photo, because i did not notice anything when taking the photo or anything while sight seeing in the area.  i have always been interested in ufo's and always wanted to witness one for myself, so i was disappointed that i did not see the object until i got home.  i looked at the photo very carefully and did some adjustments to the photo because i always take photos in jpeg and raw, so i am able to make adjustments with the raw format photo.  i could never get the object in the photo to become very clear, but could see some small details that made the object appear round in shape and dark in color.  i thought that since the object was not clear that it must have been far away from where we were when i took the photo.  it was a bright day and i had the camera aperture set at f3.5, iso set at 400, resolution set at 6016 x 4000, and lens set at 22mm.  with these settings the camera automatically set the shutter speed at 1/250 seconds, so the shutter speed was fast enough to stop the object.  none of the other photos taken in the area had the object in them.
content.summary: Unexpected capture in photo

content.detailedDescription: On 9/11/15 friday night, i was at home with my two children, my mother was visiting..At approx. 9:50pm my daughter ask me to come outside and see what an object in the sky was, i was prepared to tell her it was a star and leave it at that, i noticed to southwest of my home a pulsating light changing colors red,green and white, east of it was another light solid green..Out of nowhere it was joined by two other green lights which shaped to a triangle, my kids exclaimed wow as they saw a object take off at a great rate of speed..I looked up and then saw another object take off at a great rate of speed...Me and my mother let out a gasp and started yelled ''did you see that?''..A few seconds later we noticed lights coming in above my home...It got as low as we could see the light changing colors from red, green to white..My son remarked ''that's circle shaped'' and i noticed it was as well..It made no noise as it passed over my house..And then we noticed a light come back over and descend south east and settle stationary in the sky..We noticed the triangle shaped lights were still there and another triangle shapes lights to our west...We all went inside explaining what we saw and as we went back outside 10min later, every light was gone..Just like that..It was the most insane experience i have ever had..This happened of the course of 30min ...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange lights and object sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on the back porch when i noticed a silver spot in the sky. i observed the spot long enough to know that it was not a weather balloon, not an aircraft, not a helicopter as they cannot fly at that altitude, not a satellite, not the space station and not  a helium balloon.

 the object remained stationary which led me to believe that it was truly a ufo. i went inside to get my binoculars and  when i returned the object was gone. i do not have a photo to share with you, but i am extremely confident that it was something not of an ordinary every day object. there were no contrails and the clouds were moving to the east but the object remained stationary.

i was hoping that some one had photographed this object as i am taking this sighting very seriously.

this was something way out of the ordinary for me as i have never witnessed a ufo before.

because i quickly ran into the house to get my binoculars i missed the direction  the object  had taken.
content.summary: It was a silver dot that remained still even though the wind was blowing the cloudes away from the object.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking outside my bedroom window at 1:30am on the 12th of april 2014. i couldn't fall asleep so i started to look out my window. it was a clear night with no clouds in the sky a full moon. all of a sudden i saw a large blue circular light hovering above my neighbours house across the road. the unknown object was the size of a small plane about 100ft away from me. it was covered in blue orbs of light that brightened the night sky. it made no sound what so ever. as i was looking at the object i got the feeling that i couldn't move. i was just looking at it i couldn't move no mater how hard i tried. i felt terribly scared as i didn't know what was going to happen. i started to sweat uncontrollably as i tried to move. then suddenly it vanished after 3 minutes and reappeared within 30 seconds. it changed the colour from a light blue to a white light and continued to hover over the house to the north east whereas it was north of the house the first time it appeared. it continued to hover for another 4/5 minutes before it vanished for good. once the unknown object vanished i was able to move my body again. i had sweated so much that my bed was completely wet. i didn't mention anything to my parents until a few days after the event.
content.summary: A light blue cirlce n the sky the size of a small plane then turned white and vanished no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Hwy 510, between. roy and spanaway washington. saturday, september 12th,2015, 10:12am (approximately)

driving on hwy 510 towards spanaway, i looked out the passenger side window and saw a saucer shaped object hovering well above the treeline. thete were no clouds, aircrafts, balloons,or any other recognizable objects in the sky at that time. the object appeared to be silver or chrome like in color, and highly reflective. it just hovered in one spot.I turned away for a few seconds to tell my husband (who was driving)and when i looked at it again, it was there for a few more seconds and then disappeared. no visible take off or flight path.
content.summary: Driving towards. spanaway on hwy 510,i looked out our vehicle window. and noticed a saucer. shaped object hovering the air. there. were no clouds, aircrafts, or other recognizable objects in the area. it was reflective and appeared chrome like in color.

content.detailedDescription: Outside taking pitcher of ranbow . found object in pitcher. didnot know what it is.Lookes like hocky puck. suck it was a cliar day didnot see it till looked it pitcher.Do not know houe to send pitcher sarley about spelling
content.summary: Object found pitcher of ranbow

content.detailedDescription: I live in nw indiana on my way home from job estimate traveling north on county line road near hebron in at exactly 6:35 pm central standard time i observed in the nw sky a very bright solid metal looking object very shiny round and oval the sun was setting yellow and orange object was very white bright light which drew my attention it stayed traveling on a se trajectory i continued to watch the object as it moved slowly towards the sunset from my perspective not actually towards the sun per say when it then turned slowly and it appeared to be a distinct rectangle flat with sharp lines and pointy corners and very shiny reflective surface no longer white light but reflecting the colors of the sunset as if it was trying to blend into the background then it just disappeared in the blink of an eye it was gone no trace i scanned the entire horizon no more object i observed for apx 1.5 minutes sky was clear at sunset
content.summary: Metalic very bright shiny clear sky round oval turned flat rectangular reflected sunset or tried to blend dissapeared in blink of an eye observed for apx 1.5 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my hot tub this past winter watching the sky.  i was looking at the stars and watching for meteors.  i had recently bought a large refracting telescope and was just in the process that week of looking for a place to set it up.  so, i was sitting there relaxing (no drinking) and i see a star-like light moving in the southeastern sky.  nothing strange about that since i live between philly and baltimore and there are always planes on their flight paths.  however, this light was moving across those paths rather than along them.  it had no strobe and i heard no sound.  it was a quiet winter night.  i figured it was a satellite and thought "how neat."  it was moving fast and was the size of a large star in the sky but not venus-like.  well, as i watched it move across the sky, it suddenly flashed and grew twice it size for about a second then simply disappeared from view.  it did not grow smaller.  it simply disappeared.  well, i thought that i was strange and that i must have been mistaken.  then a second star-like light that i had not been tracking moved from an angle into that same approximate spot about 30 seconds later and did the same thing...Flashed to about twice it original size and disappeared.  so, i am confident that both did this.  nothing more that i could tell.  but after 33 years with the army and seeing lots of "interesting" things, this was not normal.

so, actually i think this is the second time.  about a month before in the western sky, i see a very similar thing...Small time of night but the star-light is very tiny...Barely visible.  i definitely thought that it was a satellite.  it did not flash but simply disappeared from my vision.  it didn't reach my horizon so i wondered why i couldn't see it. it was moving faster than the typical aircraft flights i see each day.  but, then, three more small moving light came from different angles into that general spot in the sky and disappeared as well.  plans don't converge from different angles and satellites moving across the sky don't come in threes or fours.  so that's my story.  was watching your tv show and thought i would at least drop this note.
content.summary: Two starlike objects moving then flashed brightly and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Observed by intire crowd at drive in theater,first noticed it over lake erie floating like a balloon toward me. came right in front of movie screen and hovered flashing symbols similar to hieroglyphics. felt like it was directed right at me but i did not understand the symbols. after ten minutes or so hovering it rose slowly then whipped away so fast could not tell direction. was in the lorain journal the next day cut it out and saved it then lost it.
content.summary: Like blue aluminum disc flashing symbols floating like a baloon

content.detailedDescription:
I was just woke up around 4.55am. suddenly i felt like i should go out in backyard. when i was in my backyard i don't know why i just felt something is staring at me from above and i show the craft first it was stationary then started hovering after few seconds its took the speed of science fiction and left round or circular mist ring. i think ring formed due to sound barrier.  
        when i told my parent about this they told me this is my creation. but when i insisted my father told me he experienced same many times in his childhood.
content.summary: Metal disc

content.detailedDescription: At exactly 12:56 am on sept. 14, 2015 i was letting my dogs out for their final run. i looked up at the sky and notices a cluster of "approx" 20 hazy white lights. i tried to count them but they kept rapidly changing formation. this cluster kept pulsating, interchanging and dancing around each other as it moved fairly quickly through the sky. it's direction when first noticed, was heading west then south then east. it eventually faded out when it went into the edge of a cloud cover. the area that i observed it in was clear sky. as it moved through the sky it would form somewhat of a circle then split into 2 different clusters, then somewhat of a line and at one point looked what formed a perfect arrow. it was like it was alive and pulsating, i had to continue to move around the yard to follow it's movement, but did not take my eyes off of it. at one point both of my chihuahua's started growling and that is when i started feeling very uncomfortable with what i was seeing. i literally started trembling because it's maneuver of changing directions was happening right above me.
content.summary: Cluster of hazy, pulsating white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sent to cam rahn bay by the 101st airborne div to protect an airforce unit from being overrun  it was 400 am i got blown up in ammunition stock pile when charge was set off i was on ground unconcious i didnt see it it is on film i seen film after i came back to from blackairforce mp had first vhs camera no sound yet 1971 i observved it on film i laid on grond and it was pitch black but for fire of explosion you could see the object come accross the sky very swiftly it looked like the moon it was same shape and almost same size very bright white color like the moon then it stopped as it came close to the beach on my right about 500 yards out amnd up wards of 500 it opened up the outer skin or surface of the sky like a zipper and an alien or small person was in side with clouds going by i seen cluds like stairs coming don to ground while the ammunition kept blowing up as i lay on ground on my back then he the mp moved camera and i seen an entity lraning over me with a black cape or like wings on his back the flames kept roaring over top stock pile and coming down to burn me but the entity absorbed the heat from the flames and you could see the heat energy being directed back up to the moon or object i still remeber it all i was dead for over 45 minutes i asked mp he had hi watch on they helped me on the ground i was gonne the oxygen was sucked out of me from blast of stock pile going off it blew me up in blast upwards fromm   blast it left crater in groun 80 feet deep and size of field around i never saw it until i observed his film on the vhs camera i wanted to keep it but the airforce has it it was there film i watched it all and i know they saved my life i think they are from god trying stop all wars its definaty real i saw the black sky push inward like it was rubber as the moon pushed on it it was like a lining its all on film airforce archives cam rahn bay may 17-18 1971 4-6am it got light out as i came back to i fealt as though god or some one saved my life heavenly this i know is real but i could not get the film others all watched it too who were there i also saw a cigar shaped ufo in 1991 in pa  where i lived it had a pilot and a copilot in it the y turned light on inside i could see them as they observed me looking they were reading my mind i let them alone they left i left my cousin was in truck with me and a ups truck fallowed me he saw it too i left because i did not want them to be known so i left i told them to leave because he the ups guy would report them so they left area oalso
content.summary: It came accross sky size of the moon it looked like the moon but it wasnt it is on film at airforce archivesi  there was an alien in side of it that unzipped the circle  and you could see briht light inside then clouds were going by and a cloud like ladde

content.detailedDescription: Driving home at 11:30 at night (sept. 12th) we noticed a extremely bright stationary white light in the northwestern sky.  too high up to be from a cell phone tower and couldn't be on top of any building since the highest buildings in the area are 3 stories high.  the light was much brighter and bigger than the brightest stars and never made any sound. there were no blinking or colored lights like a plane would have. we only saw the light for about 1 minute before reaching home. we went out tonight (sept. 13th) at the same time to see if we could find the light again.  we did not.  we have no idea what this light could have been.
content.summary: Extremely bright stationary light.  too bright and large  to be a plane or star.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to my sisters house when i noticed one of the streets that i needed to take was blocked offso i pulled up in the parking lot to turn around that's when i noticed them to my left and the sky i parked my car got out and watchedand that's when i saw the several moving objects when i realized what i thought they werei started to record them with my phonethey didn't seem to show up on the video so i took a couple picturesthe pictures aren't very good but you can still see them
content.summary: Observed multiple lighted objects moving in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv at a home on lakeshore road in oakville ontario with the two owners on june 4 2015.  at about 11 p.M. one of the owners noticed a bright light when looking out of a back window.  we thought it was the moon but quickly realized that it was much brighter.  we went outside and observed a very bright white light hovering over lake ontario directly behind the house facing south east.  the sky was clear with no noticeable clouds.  we also saw the moon further to the right (south).  we then looked at the light through binoculars and it appeared to be a flat surfaced diagonal circle made up of many white lights. i got out my camera (nikon coolpix l120 with 21x zoom) and took several photos and videos.  i put the camera on a tripod for some of the shots.  through the camera lens the object appeared to be more of a yellow-orange colour.  it was round but seemed pitted and had an interior outline (like a pizza crust).  the outermost edge was fuzzy.  in the video you can see that it was pulsating.  in some photos there also appears to be a small red circle to the right of the main circle.  it cast a large reflection on the lake.  it did not appear to be moving but at times it would suddenly disappear and then reappear in another spot nearby about 10 seconds to one minute later.  we were baffled and excited.  at approximately 11:50 it suddenly disappeared.  i stayed outside for about 20 more minutes but it did not reappear.  i have never seen photos or videos like the ones i took.
content.summary: Bright white/orange pulsating light hovering over lake ontario which disappeared and reappeared in different spots

content.detailedDescription:
My whole family was outside roasting marshmallows and my mom commented on how pretty the stars were. we all looked up and that's when my sister pointed out the weird shape in the sky. at first i couldn't see it well because it was very dim and nonchalant. i assumed it was a stray cloud or something because all i noticed was a white-ish blue-ish glow, but i quickly focussed and saw the shape. we only saw it for a few seconds, (it was already almost halfway across the sky when she pointed it out.) but i got a pretty good look at it. it large a v shape. my father, mother and i could see a defined edge to the shape, while my sister only saw dim glowing lights. the lights looked to me like little dimly glowing spots. they weren't like the star reminiscent led looking lights on planes. they looked more like the light of glow sticks that had been left out for a few hours. there was absolutely no sound during the entire incident which was strange because at the height it appeared to be, we should've heard something. the path it took was really steady and straight. it moved more like it was an object rolling across a frictionless surface or something gliding in a straight path than something using thrust or wind propellers. 
my initial feeling was a mixture of amazement and disbelief. i was freaking out, but i wasn't afraid. i really wished i could see more of it. my immediate thoughts about it were that it seemed almost exactly like what some people had described the beginning of the phoenix lights story to be (not the bright lights like in the videos,just the accounts of some of the suburban families.) my first assumption was that it could've been some secret stealth craft testing by hunter army airfield, but my family seemed to disagree. 
we eventually lost sight of it when it flew out of view behind the trees. (it never "zoomed" away. it kept a constant speed the entire duration of the sighting.)
content.summary: Large v shaped solid object with seemingly glowing spots flew completely soundless over my neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription:
In the spring of 1967 my mother and i were living in gates oregon waiting until the end of the school year to join my father in alaska. we watched the tv program "green acres". mom rose at the end to go into the kitchen, i wanted to ward off bedtime by waiting thru the theme song. 
 from the kitchen i heard a sound from the sink as if something were placed into it and my mother say my name and "come here there's a ufo outside" i thought she was joking but then the dog, not usually a barker started barking seriously. i went to the kitchen and from the window over the kitchen sink i could see a perfect sphere of orange light.
 it was moving east to west in a line which approximated the path of the santiam river or the road which ran beside it. the object was moving quite slowly and made a turn to the south. the flight path would have taken it a few yards east of the house. it also took it out of sight behind three large cedar trees which grew on a slight knoll our driveway circled. mom,i and the dog dashed out the door to see where it was going or if it would land.
 it did not appear on our side of the trees and the dog stopped barking.
 it was a beautiful glow, not hard on the eyes and i saw nothing like it for decades and then only as a movie effect.
 our house was located no more than a mile north east of a small local, daytime only air field. it consisted of a mowed field, an air sock and a quansit hut, no night time flights. and i never saw a helicopter in the area day or night. 
mom called the local authorities and asked if anything odd had been reported. she was told nothing had been and no one called back or came to interview us for a police report. 
mom passed in 1994 and i, as the only other witness, thought it time to have this recorded.
content.summary: Slow movng orange ball following river until turned and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my family making smores over embers (not a fire) because it decided to cool down tonight when i looked up and saw what looked like a v shape of glowing lights. at first i thought maybe it was birds' wings reflecting light. i looked around and realized that besides the street lamp (it wasn't over the street lamp yet), there was nothing it could be reflecting. the smoke was causing the lights to be blurry so i pointed up and asked my family what it was. my sister freaked out a little and told me she had no clue as to what it was but that it was v shaped and was definitely a vessel. i could see it a little better after the smoke cleared out of my face, and i could definitely tell it was not anything reflecting. my whole family agreed that it was a sold, v shaped vessel with glowing lights on the bottom. when it flew above us, it made absolutely no sound at all. not even a buzz. the lights weren't extremely bright. it kept on a very straight coursed path going past our trees in our yard. it was higher than all of the oak trees in our yard, and it was significantly large. my reaction during the sighting was simply, "what in the world is this thing?" my sister brought up the fact that it looked very, very similar to the phoenix lights in arizona. my family joked around for a little bit about the experience, and then afterwards, it wasn't really a feeling of, "was that real?" i knew it was real, but my reaction was more or less, "i can't believe that just happened...What do you do after something like that happens? do you report it? do you tell someone? do you keep quiet?" i lost sight of the object because it went behind the trees. it was freaky to say the least.
content.summary: Saw v shaped vessel with faded glowing lights on the bottom fly over us then disappear over and behind trees

content.detailedDescription:
1) driving home from the grocery store. just leaving the parking lot.
2) it was so bright that i couldn't miss it.
3) i thought it was a radio or tv tower. however, i have lived here most of my life. i knew there was not a tower anywhere near the area where i first saw the object. however, it just confused me because it appeared totally stationary. i then realized that it was an object hovering. it amazed me due to the object's clarity. i have no preconceived desire to ever see a ufo. i was going about the business of my errand with no thought whatsoever about a ufo.
4) the object hovered, moved rapidly to the right, and flashed its red lights. it then flashed green lights and hovered again. next, it moved to the left, back to the right, and straight up. it moved with a speed not possible with any aircraft i know of. it changed angles exceptionally fast. it then moved directly downward with great speed. throughout its movement, it changed colors between red and green.
5) i was simply amazed at what i saw. i am a very stable person and well respected in our community. i take no drugs and drink zero alcohol. i was in a very sharp state of mind when i saw this. 
6) i lost sight of the object when it moved straight downward and disappeared. 

i know that this was real. i know that it was not a helicopter. there is no way a helicopter, no matter how talented the pilot, could engage in the maneuvers i witnessed. it so startled me that i did not think to record it via my phone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed object for about 8 minutes. appeared to be about three miles directly west. had very bright green and red lights. moved in a way that defies the laws of physics. saw this object very clearly

content.detailedDescription:
During the night of saturday may 19th 2012, i was visiting a cottage in the north kawartha area of ontario, canada, near a town called apsley.  there were four of us that weekend including the host and hostess.  around 8:30 that evening, after dinner, the host declared "they're back" while peering out the window.  

we all walked over to see what he was looking at and discovered a very bright, star like light across the bay, a few miles from the cottage.  at first i tried to find an explanation for the light, but the more i looked at it the less natural it seemed.  it was stationary, hovering in one spot but it seemed to also flicker.  it appeared to shift in shape and glowed in changing colours.  the light could have been a star, but it was much brighter than any of the other stars in the sky that night, especially considering how close it was to the horizon.  it reflected clearly in the lake below. 

this got me intrigued and although at first, i admit, i thought perhaps the host was leading me on and knew exactly what this strange sight was.  maybe it was something he did with all his guests to make a quiet night a bit more exciting. they both insisted however, that the light was unexplainable to them as well and that it came back weekly during the summer.  their stories continued and i started to reach for my digital slr and tripod.

we walked out to the shore and i set up my tripod, focused across the bay at the strange light.  at this point, it had already been 15 or 20 minutes since the host spotted it.  i took a few snapshots and changed my settings to get a some different lighting options. it was very difficult getting any light into the lens as it was extremely dark and moonlit.  i opened my shutter speed and hoped for the best.  after about 30-40 minutes hoovering, the object seemed to zoom off in a western direction at light speed.  it was gone. 

when i got back into the cottage i opened my laptop and started looking at the images i took.  to my surprise i captured 2 images back to back which were taken within 10-15 seconds of each other.  the photos are untouched and straight off my camera.  it's visible that the foreground trees and background trees are sill and sharp.  with my nighttime shutter speed, blurring was a concern, however i believe i have captured this thing making small movements in the night sky.  as seen in the circled zoomed in view, the light is bright and it is moving. it's clear that the object is close to the horizon line and is even reflecting in the lake below unlike the stars that night.

i believe what we witnessed that night was something extraterrestrial.  what do you make of these images?
content.summary: Mysterious lights observed near apsley ontario

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were carpooling home from work headed east, when we noticed a bright white light ahead of us and off to the right (sw). work gets out at 6:30 pm, so we must have noticed it around 6:35 - 6:40. my friend noticed it first, and made a comment something to the effect of “wow that is a bright cell phone tower, when did they put that up?” being familiar with the area i knew that there was no cell phone tower nearby, and i realized that it was much higher in the sky, at that point in time, than a cell phone tower would be. as we continued driving down the road, toward the object, we began to intently watch it as we drew closer. the light was a very bright white, almost like the lights you would see at an outdoor football field. eventually we noticed that there was not one light but three shining directly toward us. we both began to get a little unnerved, and said to each other that it must be a plane coming in for a landing because it appeared to get lower to the ground, but there are no airports/landing fields in the general area. we continued to watch it as it came closer, and were looking intently for strobe lights or red and green wing lights that a plane would normally have. it ended up having none. at this point we actually parked our truck in the middle of the road to watch as it past low overheard. it seemed to move very slowly across the road, somewhere between 500 and 1,000 feet over our heads. as it passed slowly over us we noticed that there was no landing gear visible, the body of the craft was a black/dark solid triangle, and it appeared to have six of the bright white lights. one at each point, and one centrally located between each of the lights on the points. it also had one sold red, unblinking light on the bottom center of the craft. we had our windows rolled down and could hear no sound whatsoever. as it passed over us, going nw, it abruptly seemed to change directions slightly toward the west without banking or making any type of obvious turn, and disappeared over the tree line. we were in a moderately wooded, residential area, however there seemed to be little or no traffic or people outside on the street. on a side note, several hours before we left work, my friend did see a twin rotor type, military helicopter fly over our worksite. i did not see it myself, but did hear the sound of the helicopter pass over my building.
content.summary: Witnessed by myself and a friend (in the same vehicle) while driving home from work.

content.detailedDescription:
I observed a large fireball roll across a mountain ridge about two miles from my home in north central fremont county in june 2013. it made no sound, and later inspection by a neighbor revealed no burnt trees or other vegetation. the event lasted only a few seconds.  i observed it from an altitude of 9000 feet, and estimated it to occur at an elevation of about 9700 feet.

the fireball seemed to roll across the ridge effortlessly, and caused no visible fire, which seemed impossible, considering its estimated diameter of about 20 feet.

i have not observed a repeat of this event.
content.summary: Fireball rolled over mountain ridge

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at sifton bog natural area located on oxford street west, in london, ontario, canada. i sit there at night and stargaze and meditate. i was looking up at the night sky approximately at 9:45 pm this evening and observed 10-12 red lights that were perfectly in a line, no sound as the pass overhead. the lights appeared solid with the occassional blinking left to right. i watched as the flew from southwest to southeast and then disappeared over the treeline. i stayed for a few moments to see if they would return or if it was from an outside source but didn't see them again. i got freaked out and left and came home as fast as possible.
content.summary: 10-12 red lights in a row, no sound, flying in a straight line, all lights were right to left in a perfect line
